Package org.ginsim.core.graph.hierarchicaltransitiongraph

Class DecisionOnEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ginsim.core.graph.Edge<HierarchicalNode>
      • org.ginsim.core.graph.hierarchicaltransitiongraph.DecisionOnEdge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ToolTipsable
    public class DecisionOnEdge
extends Edge<HierarchicalNode>
implements ToolTipsable
    Store a label that represent the genes that are updated between two states source, and target. In a HTG, to compute the label of an edge, call this function for each couple of states corresponding to the edge.
    Author:
    Duncan Berenguier
